net.algem.util.module

Class GemDesktopCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.algem.util.module.GemDesktopCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, GemEventListener, GemDesktop

    public class GemDesktopCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, GemDesktop
    Algem desktop controller. This is the working space of the application.
    Since:
    1.0a 05/07/2002
